nodes.text: The Chamber of Dark Visions was part of the Scardia Station a cubical space station that served as headquarters for the Church of the Dark Side. In this chamber, the false Supreme Prophet, the pseudo-Kadann, gathered his prophets to let them hear his so-called prophecies. The room's floor was made of cold metal, and the fake Kadann's throne was located on a raised dais hidden behind a glowing red curtain.
